page.title: 09PLAYING FIELDS
page.content: We have a playing field in Fishtoft which is used for football and cricket. The tennis courts are now overgrown. There is a small play area for children with a few swings, a slide, a roundabout and a climbing frame. The large playing field at Freiston was donated by several farmers after the war as a memorial field. It is used for cricket, tennis, football and bowls and in July they hold a village fete called the Freiston Donkey Derby. Built recently on the field is the Danny Flear Centre - he was a founder member of the playing field committee. It is used for various activities including badminton, ballroom dancing, whist, bingo and social functions. Butterwick has a small field used by the football club and the school and includes a childrens play area.
